de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.fileimporter

Class AbstractFileImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.common.AbstractPlugin
      • de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.fileimporter.AbstractFileImporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpenDiabetesPlugin, FileImporter, Importer, org.pf4j.ExtensionPoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVImporter, MiBandNotifyImporter.MiBandNotifyImporterImplementation, ODVDBJsonImporter.ODVDBJsonImporterImplementation, ODVImporter.ODVImporterImplementation

    public abstract class AbstractFileImporter
extends AbstractPlugin
implements FileImporter
    This class defines the default structure how data gets imported from a file. It implements file handling of the data source All descendants must implement the template methods. preprocessingIfNeeded(String). processImport(InputStream, String).
